# Round 1: Trivia

---

## 1. Who wrote the first human rights charter?

- Cyrus the Great

---

## 2. Who discovered the Higgs boson?

- Peter Higgs

---

## 3. How many stripes and how many stars are there on the US flag? 

- 50 stars, 13 stripes

---

## 4. How many stars are the on the Australian flag?

- 6

---

## 5. Who won the Oscar Best Picture in 2020? (Last Year)

- Nomadland

---

## 6. Which country had the most Coronavirus infections as of today?

- United States

---

## 7. Who is the author of the following quote?

> The world isn't binary. Everything isn't black or white, yes or no. 

- Jeff Garvin

---

## 8. From which movie is the following quote?

> Frankly, my dear, I don't give a damn

- Gone with the wind

---

## 9. Who invented the first succesful aeroplane?

- Brothers Wright

---

## 10. Which planet is the farthest from the sun? 

- Pluto is not a planet

- Answer: Neptune
